import { Status } from '@looker/components'
import { Editor, excludedProps } from '@looker/storybook'
import { ArgsTable, Meta } from '@storybook/addon-docs'
import storyCritical from '!!raw-loader!./Critical'
import storyInform from '!!raw-loader!./Inform'
import storyNeutral from '!!raw-loader!./Neutral'
import storyPositive from '!!raw-loader!./Positive'
import storyWarn from '!!raw-loader!./Warn'

<Meta component={Status} title="Docs/Status" />

# Status

The `Status` component can be used to indicate `critical` `inform` `neutral` `positive` or `warn` of an item and to inform user and take actions. This is accomplished using `intent` property.

<Editor code={storyCritical} />

<Editor code={storyNeutral} />

<Editor code={storyInform} />

<Editor code={storyPositive} />

<Editor code={storyWarn} />

<ArgsTable of={Status} exclude={excludedProps} />
